mapper.select: SELECT pv.fullplateno plateno, pd.id, pd.`name` drivername, pd.phone driverphone, pd.headportraitmax headportraitmax, pd.headportraitmin headportraitmin, IFNULL(pd.avgrate,4.5) driverrate, pd.ordercount supportorder, pd.jobnum, pd.workstatus, IFNULL(pd.passworkstatus,'0') passworkstatus, pd.vehicletype drivertype, IFNULL((pd.wdpwdchangestate != 0),FALSE) wdpchanged, IFNULL((pd.passworkstatus != 0),FALSE) hasworkmate, lv.`name` cartype, ov.`name` opcartype, pvb.`Name` carbrand, pvc.`name` carvehcline, ( CASE pd.platformtype WHEN 0 THEN (SELECT opi.servcietel FROM op_platforminfo opi WHERE opi.status = 1) WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT llc.servicesphone FROM le_leasescompany llc WHERE llc.status = 1 AND pd.leasescompanyid = llc.id) END ) contact, pv.color FROM pub_driver pd LEFT JOIN pub_driver_vehicle_ref pdvr ON pdvr.`Status` = 1 AND pdvr.driverId = pd.id LEFT JOIN pub_vehicle pv ON pv.`Status` = 1 AND pv.id = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN pub_vehcline pvc ON pvc.`Status` = 1 AND pvc.Id = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN pub_vehcbrand pvb ON pvb.`Status` = 1 AND pvb.Id = pvc.vehcBrandID LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels_vehicle_ref ovvr ON ovvr.`status` = 1 AND ovvr.vehicleid = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels ov ON ov.`status` = 1 AND ov.Id = ovvr.vehiclemodelsid LEFT JOIN le_vehcline_models_ref lvmr ON lvmr.`Status` = 1 AND lvmr.vehclineid = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN le_vehiclemodels lv ON lv.`Status` = 1 AND lv.Id = lvmr.vehiclemodelsid WHERE 1=1 AND pd.`Status` = 1 AND pd.id = #{id}

SELECT pd.*, pv.id vehicleid FROM pub_vehicle_scope pvs, pub_driver_vehicle_ref pdvr, pub_vehicle pv, pub_driver pd WHERE 1 = 1 AND pvs.`Status` = 1 AND pv.`Status` = 1 AND pdvr.`Status` = 1 AND pd.`Status` = 1 AND pd.jobstatus = 0
AND pd.vehicletype = 0 AND pvs.vehicleid = pv.id AND pdvr.driverId = pd.id AND pdvr.vehicleId = pv.id
AND pd.identitytype = 1 AND pd.workstatus IN(${workstatuslist}) AND pvs.cityid = #{city} AND pd.id IN ( SELECT oudr.driverid FROM org_user_driver_ref oudr WHERE 1=1 AND oudr.`status` = 1 AND oudr.userid = #{userid} )

UPDATE org_order oo SET oo.pushnumber = #{pushcount} WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.orderno = #{orderno}
mapper.select: select distinct p.phone from org_order o inner join pub_driver p on o.driverid = p.id where 1=1 and ( p.workstatus='1' or (o.isusenow=1 and o.orderstatus !='7' and o.orderstatus != '8') or (o.isusenow=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, str_to_date(#{usetime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), usetime) < 120 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, str_to_date(#{usetime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), usetime) > 0 and o.orderstatus !='7' and o.orderstatus != '8' ) ) and p.Status = '1' and o.status = '1'

select distinct p.phone from org_order o inner join pub_driver p on o.driverid = p.id where 1=1 and ( p.workstatus='1' or (o.isusenow=0 and o.orderstatus != '8' and o.orderstatus !='7') or (o.isusenow=1 and o.orderstatus != '8' and o.orderstatus !='7' and o.usetime > date_sub(str_to_date(#{usetime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), interval 3 hour) and o.usetime < str_to_date(#{usetime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ) ) and p.Status = '1' and o.status = '1'
